questions.question_text: A user has requested a device that could be used for web-conferences while away from work. The device will mainly be used for emailing, document reviewing, and phone calls. Which of the following mobile devices would a technician MOST likely recommend?

discussion.content: A phablet because the device must make phone calls

comments.content: because it needs to be able to make phone calls

choices.A: Android devices use apps that are more secure than other devices.
choices.D: Android devices can receive apps from different sources.
choices.C: Android devices can only operate with a proprietary operating system.
choices.B: Android devices use open source operating systems.

discussion.content: I think B and D are boat possible?

questions.question_text: Android smartphones are typically different from other smartphone devices in that:

discussion.content: USB Optical drive is the best option here because netbook are designed with limited hardware and are small is size

questions.question_text: Legacy software needs to be installed on a netbook. Which of the following is MOST likely needed in order to install the software?

A user, Ann, is preparing to travel abroad and wants to ensure that her laptop will work properly. Which of the following components of the laptop should be verified FIRST to ensure power compatibility before traveling?

discussion.content:
"Wall outlet" is component?
I would say adapter - because you have to check if you have right adapter based on power supply in that country in which you go...
How can " monitor indicates the proper video source is selected" be true when the source is disconnected ?

comments.content: oh i see it probably means there is an option to choose the video source but the source could be disconnected.

choices.E: No device is sending source video
choices.D: The monitor’s contrast is set too high
choices.B: The monitor’s brightness is set too low
choices.C: The backlighting of the monitor is faulty

questions.question_text:
The OSD of a monitor indicates the proper video source is selected, but no image is displayed. Which of the following issues are the MOST likely reasons? (Select
TWO).
